title: US Exploring Rules to Regulate AI Tools Like ChatGPT
description: Alan Davidson, director of U.S. public policy of the Americas at Google Inc. testifies during a hearing of the Congressional-Executive Commission on Capitol Hill in Washington, on March 24, 2010. (Win McNamee/Getty Images)

title: New AI Bot ‘ChaosGPT’ Aims to Destroy Humanity and Establish Global Dominance
description: The OpenAI logo on a mobile phone in front of a computer screen displaying output from ChatGPT in Boston on March 21, 2023. (Michael Dwyer/AP Photo)

title: ChatGPT Is a Precursor to ‘AI Singularity,’ Experts Fear
description: Screens displaying the logos of OpenAI and ChatGPT in Toulouse, France, on Jan. 23, 2023. - ChatGPT is a conversational artificial intelligence software application developed by OpenAI. (Lionel Bonaventure/AFP via Getty Images)

title: Twitter Inc. Merged Into X Corp. and ‘No Longer Exists’
description: Twitter logo and a photo of Elon Musk are displayed through magnifier in this illustration taken on Oct. 27, 2022. (Dado Ruvic/Illustration/Reuters)

title: Vodafone Resolves Broadband Outage That Impacted Thousands of UK Users
description: A woman holds a phone as she passes a Vodafone store in London on May 16, 2017. (Neil Hall/Reuters)
